meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a person whose sex is not clearly defined as male or female.
meanings.sent1: The intersex individual preferred not to conform to traditional gender norms.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that the intersex baby had physical traits of both genders.
meanings.sent3: The intersex cat confused the other animals at the shelter.
meanings.sent4: Her style was intersex, blending elements of both masculine and feminine fashion.
meanings.sent5: The intersex flower displayed a unique mix of colors, unlike any other in the garden.

meanings.definition: A person or animal having both male and female sex organs or other sexual characteristics.
meanings.sent1: The intersex in the wildlife documentary fascinated viewers with its dual reproductive organs.
meanings.sent2: The intersex in the zoo was carefully monitored by the staff for any health issues.
meanings.sent3: The intersex at the farm was the subject of many jokes among the other animals.
meanings.sent4: The intersex in the pond symbolized the harmony of opposites in nature.
meanings.sent5: The intersex in the forest was a rare find, attracting researchers from around the world.
